ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) Note 1 to entry: Information, including specification of system elements and their relationships, that is sufficiently complete to support a compliant implementation of the architecture Note 2 to entry: Design provides the detailed implementation‐level physical structure, behavior, temporal relationships, and other attributes of system elements. 3.1.19 design characteristic design
